condition.desc: The account is not allowed to bind more resources at this time.
condition.doc: XEP-0205: Best Practices to Discourage Denial of Service Attacks

condition.desc: The stanza is larger than the processing entity will accept.
A connected client has attempted to send multiple stanzas to too many different intended recipients in a given time period.
condition.doc: XEP-0205: Best Practices to Discourage Denial of Service Attacks
